name: bracketstoix
title: BracketstoIX
description: This minified(only 40kb) puts Brackets on steroids without cluttering your menus:          Text Transforms(UpperCase, LowerCase, Capitalize, CamelCase, HtmlEncode, HtmlDecode, UrlEncode, Join, Split, Number, Trim Leading, Trim Trailing, Sort Ascending, Sort Descending, Remove Duplicates, Remove Empty Lines, Unix To Win, Win To Unix, Single Slash To Double, Double To Single Slash, rgb-hex, Markdown Trim Trailing),            Clipboard(Copy Filename, Copy Fullname, Regnize, ExtratortoIX),              ReplacetoIX(Replace including Words only, Selection only, Regnize),            Internet Search(Open Url, Web Search),       Compiler(scss, js6 [ECMAScript 6]).              Read the readme for the complete description and usage
author: Alexandre Bento Freire <github@a-bentofreire.com>
